name: The Sims 3: Katy Perry's Sweet Treats
name_original: The Sims 3: Katy Perry's Sweet Treats
description:
The Sims 3: Katy Perry's Sweet Treats is a strategy game developed by The Sims Studio. It came out on 05-06-2012. It was published by Electronic Arts. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play The Sims 3: Katy Perry's Sweet Treats on PC.
